metadata.title: CVE-2020-26421 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Crash in USB HID protocol dissector and possibly other dissectors inWireshark 3.4.0 and 3.2.0 to 3.2.8 allows denial of service via packetinjection or crafted capture file.

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
